import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import axios from 'axios'; import './sell.css' function Sell() { const[ids, setIds] = useState([]) const[material, setMaterial] = useState([]) function getAllAccountNumber(){ axios.get(`http://localhost:3000/add_account`) .then(res => { setIds(res.data) }) } function getMaterialName(name){ // getAllMaterial let url = `http://localhost:3000/getAllMaterial/:${name}` axios.get(url) .then(res => { setMaterial(res.data) }) } useEffect(() => { getAllAccountNumber() }, []) return (
खात नंबर
मटेरियल
उधार/रोख
किंमत
) } export default Sell
